summary: Four Vietnam Vets go to war against the drug dealers and pimps of Harlem.
cast: Paul Winfield|Carl Lee|David Downing|Tony King|Gilbert Lewis|Carl Gordon|Nathan C. Heard|Grace Jones|Jackie Page|Chuck Bergansky|Adam Wade|Hansford Rowe|Warren Taurien|Ralph Wilcox|David Connell|Rochelle LeNoir|Michael Galloway|Beverly Goodman|Doctor Hayes|Charles McGregor|John Henry Redwood
title: La guerra de Gordon
